org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling

类 CronTriggeringPolicy

    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.AbstractLifeCycle

        • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling.CronTriggeringPolicy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TriggeringPolicy, LifeCycle, LifeCycle2

    @Plugin(name="CronTriggeringPolicy",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true)
 @Scheduled
public final class CronTriggeringPolicy
extends AbstractTriggeringPolicy
    Rolls a file over based on a cron schedule.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(RollingFileManager aManager)
        Initializes the policy.
        参数:
        aManager - The RollingFileManager.

      • isTriggeringEvent

        public boolean isTriggeringEvent(LogEvent event)
        Determines whether a rollover should occur.
        参数:
        event - A reference to the currently event.
        返回:
        true if a rollover should occur.

      • getCronExpression

        public CronExpression getCronExpression()

      • createPolicy

        @PluginFactory
public static CronTriggeringPolicy createPolicy(@PluginConfiguration
                                                               Configuration configuration,
                                                               @PluginAttribute(value="evaluateOnStartup")
                                                               String evaluateOnStartup,
                                                               @PluginAttribute(value="schedule")
                                                               String schedule)
        Creates a ScheduledTriggeringPolicy.
        参数:
        configuration - the Configuration.
        evaluateOnStartup - check if the file should be rolled over immediately.
        schedule - the cron expression.
        返回:
        a ScheduledTriggeringPolicy.

      • stop

        public boolean stop(long timeout,
                    TimeUnit timeUnit)
        从接口复制的说明: LifeCycle2
        Blocks until all tasks have completed execution after a shutdown request, or the timeout occurs, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever happens first.
        指定者:
        stop 在接口中 LifeCycle2
        覆盖:
        stop 在类中 AbstractLifeCycle
        参数:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        timeUnit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        返回:
        true if the receiver was stopped cleanly and normally, false otherwise.
